description: Welcome to "Simply Home",  a lovely 3rd floor walk up apartment, nestled on the border of Clinton Hill and the beginning of  Bedford Stuyvesant.  This one bedroom with sitting room, living area, and kitchen is  comfortable and welcoming!
name: Simply Home
review: We had a great stay at Lacey's place. It's exactly what we expected. Communications and check-in were easy and the place was extremely clean. We were only there for a short trip, but it had the space and amenities for a longer stay.
